Description: On US-211 in the County of Page, in the vicinity of Kauffmans Mill Rd; Rt. 646N/S (Page County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The west right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-564 at mile marker 0.6 in the City of Norfolk, near Terminal boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 238 in the County of Rockingham, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. All south lanes are closed.

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 174.6 in the County of Rockbridge, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 173.9 in the County of Rockbridge, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
